column1: # Title: Pools of sender and receivers countries

# Comments: G7 and G20 countries as senders; E7 countries represent higher 7 emitting countries totaling to 60% of global share; E35 emit 90% of global CO2; V20 are based on Vulnerable 20 consortium https://www.v-20.org/members; Other V countries are based on EU INFORM climate risk index with Very High and High categories taken from https://drmkc.jrc.ec.europa.eu/inform-index INFORM Risk Index Mid 2023v066 (but also consider taking it from https://drmkc.jrc.ec.europa.eu/inform-index/INFORM-Climate-Change/Results-and-data to represent pools consistent with SSPs and RCPs)
Italy, San Marino and the Holy See
